item.text: Now Jesus left that place and came to his hometown, and his disciples followed him.

When the <st data-num="4521" class="">Sabbath</st> <st data-num="1096" class="">came</st>, he <st data-num="757">began</st> to <st data-num="1321" class="">teach</st> <st data-num="1722" class="">in</st> the <st data-num="4864" class="">synagogue</st>.<n id="1" /> <st data-num="4183" class="">Many</st> who <st data-num="191" class="">heard</st> him were <st data-num="1605" class="">astonished</st>, <st data-num="3004" class="">saying</st>, “<st data-num="4159" class="">Where</st> did he get <st data-num="3778" class="">these ideas</st>?<n id="2" /> <st data-num="2532" class="">And</st> <st data-num="5101" class="">what</st> is this <st data-num="4678" class="">wisdom</st> that has been <st data-num="1325" class="">given</st> to <st data-num="3778" class="">him</st>? What are <st data-num="5108">these</st> <st data-num="1411" class="">miracles</st> that are <st data-num="1096" class="">done</st> <st data-num="1223" class="">through</st> <st data-num="846" class="">his</st> <st data-num="5495" class="">hands</st>?

<st data-num="3756 1510">Isn’t</st> <st data-num="3778" class="">this</st> the <st data-num="5045" class="">carpenter</st>, the <st data-num="5207" class="">son</st><n id="1" /> of <st data-num="3137" class="">Mary</st><n id="2" /> <st data-num="2532" class="">and</st> <st data-num="80" class="">brother</st> of <st data-num="2385" class="">James</st>, <st data-num="2500" class="">Joses</st>, <st data-num="2455" class="">Judas</st>, <st data-num="2532" class="">and</st> <st data-num="4613" class="">Simon</st>? <st data-num="2532" class="">And</st> <st data-num="3756 1510">aren’t</st> <st data-num="846" class="">his</st> <st data-num="79" class="">sisters</st> <st data-num="5602" class="">here</st> <st data-num="4314" class="">with</st> <st data-num="1473" class="">us</st>?” <st data-num="2532" class="">And so</st> they <st data-num="4624">took offense</st> <st data-num="1722" class="">at</st> <st data-num="846" class="">him</st>.

<st data-num="2532" class="">Then</st><n id="1" /> <st data-num="2424" class="">Jesus</st> <st data-num="3004" class="">said</st> to <st data-num="846" class="">them</st>, “A <st data-num="4396" class="">prophet</st> <st data-num="1510" class="">is</st> <st data-num="3756" class="">not</st> <st data-num="820">without honor</st> <st data-num="1508">except</st> <st data-num="1722" class="">in</st> <st data-num="846" class="">his</st> <st data-num="3968" class="">hometown</st>, <st data-num="2532" class="">and</st> <st data-num="1722" class="">among</st> <st data-num="846" class="">his</st> <st data-num="4773" class="">relatives</st>, <st data-num="2532" class="">and</st> <st data-num="1722" class="">in</st> <st data-num="846" class="">his</st> own <st data-num="3614" class="">house</st>.”

He was <st data-num="3756" class="">not</st> <st data-num="1410" class="">able</st> to <st data-num="4160" class="">do</st> a <st data-num="1411" class="">miracle</st> <st data-num="1563" class="">there</st>, <st data-num="1508">except</st> to <st data-num="2007" class="">lay</st> his <st data-num="5495" class="">hands</st> <st data-num="2007">on</st> a <st data-num="3641" class="">few</st> <st data-num="732">sick people</st> and <st data-num="2323" class="">heal</st> them.
And he was amazed because of their unbelief. Then he went around among the villages and taught.
Jesus called the Twelve and began to send them out two by two. He gave them authority over the unclean spirits.

He <st data-num="3853" class="">instructed</st> <st data-num="846" class="">them</st> <st data-num="2443" class="">to</st> <st data-num="142" class="">take</st> <st data-num="3367" class="">nothing</st> <st data-num="1519" class="">for</st> the <st data-num="3598" class="">journey</st> <st data-num="1508">except</st> a <st data-num="4464" class="">staff</st><n id="1" />—<st data-num="3361" class="">no</st> <st data-num="740" class="">bread</st>, <st data-num="3361" class="">no</st> <st data-num="4082" class="">bag</st>,<n id="2" /> <st data-num="3361" class="">no</st> <st data-num="5475" class="">money</st> <st data-num="1519" class="">in</st> their <st data-num="2223" class="">belts</st>—

<st data-num="235" class="">and</st> to <st data-num="5265">put on</st> <st data-num="4547" class="">sandals</st> <st data-num="2532">but</st> <st data-num="3361" class="">not</st> to <st data-num="1746" class="">wear</st> <st data-num="1417" class="">two</st> <st data-num="5509" class="">tunics</st>.<n id="1" />

He <st data-num="3004" class="">said</st> to <st data-num="846" class="">them</st>, “<st data-num="3699">Wherever</st> you <st data-num="1525" class="">enter</st> a <st data-num="3614" class="">house</st>, <st data-num="3306" class="">stay</st> <st data-num="1563" class="">there</st><n id="1" /> <st data-num="2193" class="">until</st> you <st data-num="1831" class="">leave</st> the <st data-num="1564" class="">area</st>.

<st data-num="3739 302">If</st> a <st data-num="5117" class="">place</st> will <st data-num="3361" class="">not</st> <st data-num="1209" class="">welcome</st> <st data-num="4771" class="">you</st> <st data-num="3366" class="">or</st> <st data-num="191" class="">listen</st> to <st data-num="4771" class="">you</st>, as you <st data-num="1607" class="">go out</st> <st data-num="1564" class="">from there</st>, <st data-num="1621" class="">shake</st> the <st data-num="5522" class="">dust</st> <st data-num="1621">off</st><n id="1" /> <st data-num="4771" class="">your</st> <st data-num="4228" class="">feet</st> <st data-num="1519" class="">as</st> a <st data-num="3142" class="">testimony</st> against <st data-num="846" class="">them</st>.”

<st data-num="2532" class="">So</st><n id="1" /> they <st data-num="1831">went out</st> and <st data-num="2784" class="">preached</st> <st data-num="2443" class="">that</st> all should <st data-num="3340" class="">repent</st>.
They cast out many demons and anointed many sick people with olive oil and healed them.
Now King Herod heard this, for Jesus’ name had become known. Some were saying, “John the baptizer has been raised from the dead, and because of this, miraculous powers are at work in him.”

<st data-num="243" class="">Others</st> <st data-num="3004" class="">said</st>, “He <st data-num="1510" class="">is</st> <st data-num="2243" class="">Elijah</st>.” <st data-num="243" class="">Others</st> <st data-num="3004" class="">said</st>, “He is a <st data-num="4396" class="">prophet</st>, <st data-num="5613" class="">like</st> <st data-num="1520" class="">one</st> of the <st data-num="4396" class="">prophets</st> from the past.”

<st data-num="1161" class="">But</st> when <st data-num="2264" class="">Herod</st> <st data-num="191" class="">heard</st> this, he <st data-num="3004" class="">said</st>, “<st data-num="2491">John</st>, <st data-num="3739" class="">whom</st> <st data-num="1473" class="">I</st> <st data-num="607" class="">beheaded</st>, has been <st data-num="1453" class="">raised</st>!”

<st data-num="1063" class="">For</st> <st data-num="2264" class="">Herod</st> <st data-num="846" class="">himself</st> had <st data-num="649" class="">sent</st> men, <st data-num="2902" class="">arrested</st> <st data-num="2491" class="">John</st>, <st data-num="2532" class="">and</st> <st data-num="1210" class="">bound</st> <st data-num="846" class="">him</st> <st data-num="1722" class="">in</st> <st data-num="5438" class="">prison</st> <st data-num="1223">on account of</st> <st data-num="2266" class="">Herodias</st>, <st data-num="846" class="">his</st> <st data-num="80" class="">brother</st> <st data-num="5376">Philip’s</st> <st data-num="1135" class="">wife</st>, <st data-num="3754" class="">because</st> Herod<n id="1" /> had <st data-num="1060" class="">married</st> <st data-num="846" class="">her</st>.

<st data-num="1063" class="">For</st> <st data-num="2491" class="">John</st> had repeatedly <st data-num="3004" class="">told</st><n id="1" /> <st data-num="2264" class="">Herod</st>, “It is <st data-num="3756" class="">not</st> <st data-num="1832" class="">lawful</st> for <st data-num="4771" class="">you</st> to <st data-num="2192" class="">have</st> <st data-num="4771" class="">your</st> <st data-num="80">brother’s</st> <st data-num="1135" class="">wife</st>.”<n id="2" />

<st data-num="1161" class="">So</st> <st data-num="2266" class="">Herodias</st> <st data-num="1758">nursed a grudge</st> against <st data-num="846" class="">him</st> <st data-num="2532" class="">and</st> <st data-num="2309" class="">wanted</st> to <st data-num="615" class="">kill</st> <st data-num="846" class="">him</st>. <st data-num="2532" class="">But</st><n id="1" /> she <st data-num="1410" class="">could</st> <st data-num="3756" class="">not</st>
because Herod stood in awe of John and protected him, since he knew that John was a righteous and holy man. When Herod heard him, he was thoroughly baffled, and yet he liked to listen to John.
But a suitable day came, when Herod gave a banquet on his birthday for his court officials, military commanders, and leaders of Galilee.

When <st data-num="846" class="">his</st> <st data-num="2364" class="">daughter</st> <st data-num="2266" class="">Herodias</st><n id="1" /> <st data-num="1525">came in</st> <st data-num="2532" class="">and</st> <st data-num="3738" class="">danced</st>, she <st data-num="700" class="">pleased</st> <st data-num="2264" class="">Herod</st> <st data-num="2532" class="">and</st> his <st data-num="4873">dinner guests</st>. The <st data-num="935" class="">king</st> <st data-num="3004">said</st> to the <st data-num="2877" class="">girl</st>, “<st data-num="154" class="">Ask</st> <st data-num="1473" class="">me</st> for <st data-num="3739">whatever</st> you <st data-num="2309" class="">want</st> <st data-num="2532" class="">and</st> I will <st data-num="1325" class="">give</st> it to <st data-num="4771" class="">you</st>.”

He <st data-num="3660" class="">swore</st> to <st data-num="846" class="">her</st>,<n id="1" /> “<st data-num="3739">Whatever</st> you <st data-num="154" class="">ask</st> I will <st data-num="1325" class="">give</st> <st data-num="4771" class="">you</st>, <st data-num="2193">up to</st> <st data-num="2255" class="">half</st> <st data-num="1473" class="">my</st> <st data-num="932" class="">kingdom</st>.”<n id="2" />

<st data-num="2532" class="">So</st><n id="1" /> she <st data-num="1831">went out</st> and <st data-num="3004">said</st> to <st data-num="846" class="">her</st> <st data-num="3384" class="">mother</st>, “<st data-num="5101" class="">What</st> should I <st data-num="154" class="">ask for</st>?” Her mother <st data-num="3004">said</st>,<n id="2" /> “The <st data-num="2776" class="">head</st> of <st data-num="2491" class="">John</st> the <st data-num="907" class="">baptizer</st>.”<n id="3" />

<st data-num="2117" class="">Immediately</st> she <st data-num="1525 4710">hurried back</st> <st data-num="4314" class="">to</st> the <st data-num="935" class="">king</st> and <st data-num="154">made</st> her <st data-num="154" class="">request:</st><n id="1" /> “<st data-num="1473">I</st> <st data-num="2309" class="">want</st> the <st data-num="2776" class="">head</st> of <st data-num="2491" class="">John</st> the <st data-num="910" class="">Baptist</st> <st data-num="1909" class="">on</st> a <st data-num="4094" class="">platter</st> <st data-num="1824" class="">immediately</st>.”

Although it <st data-num="1096" class="">grieved</st> the <st data-num="935" class="">king</st> <st data-num="4036" class="">deeply</st>,<n id="1" /> he did <st data-num="3756" class="">not</st> <st data-num="2309" class="">want</st> to <st data-num="114" class="">reject</st> <st data-num="846" class="">her</st> request <st data-num="1223">because of</st> his <st data-num="3727" class="">oath</st> <st data-num="2532" class="">and</st> his <st data-num="345" class="">guests</st>.

<st data-num="2532" class="">So</st><n id="1" /> the <st data-num="935" class="">king</st> <st data-num="649" class="">sent</st> an <st data-num="4688" class="">executioner</st> <st data-num="2117">at once</st> to <st data-num="5342" class="">bring</st> <st data-num="846">John’s</st><n id="2" /> <st data-num="2776" class="">head</st>, and he <st data-num="565">went</st> and <st data-num="607">beheaded</st> <st data-num="846">John</st> in <st data-num="5438">prison</st>.

He <st data-num="5342" class="">brought</st> <st data-num="846" class="">his</st> <st data-num="2776" class="">head</st> <st data-num="1909" class="">on</st> a <st data-num="4094" class="">platter</st> <st data-num="2532" class="">and</st> <st data-num="1325" class="">gave</st> <st data-num="846" class="">it</st> to the <st data-num="2877" class="">girl</st>, <st data-num="2532" class="">and</st> the <st data-num="2877" class="">girl</st> <st data-num="1325" class="">gave</st> <st data-num="846" class="">it</st> to <st data-num="846" class="">her</st> <st data-num="3384" class="">mother</st>.
When John’s disciples heard this, they came and took his body and placed it in a tomb.
Then the apostles gathered around Jesus and told him everything they had done and taught.

He <st data-num="3004" class="">said</st> to <st data-num="846" class="">them</st>, “<st data-num="1204" class="">Come</st> with me <st data-num="2398">privately</st> <st data-num="1519" class="">to</st> an <st data-num="2048" class="">isolated</st> <st data-num="5117" class="">place</st> <st data-num="2532" class="">and</st> <st data-num="373" class="">rest</st> a <st data-num="3641" class="">while</st>” (<st data-num="1063">for</st> <st data-num="4183" class="">many</st> <st data-num="1510">were</st> <st data-num="2064" class="">coming</st> <st data-num="2532" class="">and</st> <st data-num="5217" class="">going</st>, <st data-num="2532" class="">and</st> there was <st data-num="3761" class="">no</st> <st data-num="2119" class="">time</st> <st data-num="1519" class="">to</st> <st data-num="2068">eat</st>).

<st data-num="2532" class="">So</st> they <st data-num="565">went away</st> <st data-num="2596">by</st> <st data-num="2398">themselves</st> <st data-num="1722" class="">in</st> a <st data-num="4143">boat</st><n id="1" /> <st data-num="1519" class="">to</st> some <st data-num="2048" class="">remote</st> <st data-num="5117">place</st>.

<st data-num="2532" class="">But</st> <st data-num="4183" class="">many</st> <st data-num="1492" class="">saw</st> <st data-num="846" class="">them</st> <st data-num="5217" class="">leaving</st> <st data-num="2532" class="">and</st> <st data-num="1921" class="">recognized</st> them, <st data-num="2532" class="">and</st> they <st data-num="3979">hurried on foot</st><n id="1" /> <st data-num="575" class="">from</st> <st data-num="3956" class="">all</st> the <st data-num="4172" class="">towns</st><n id="2" /> and <st data-num="4936" class="">arrived</st> <st data-num="1563" class="">there</st> <st data-num="4281" class="">ahead</st> of <st data-num="846" class="">them</st>.<n id="3" />
As Jesus came ashore he saw the large crowd, and he had compassion on them because they were like sheep without a shepherd. So he taught them many things.
When it was already late, his disciples came to him and said, “This is an isolated place and it is already very late.

<st data-num="630" class="">Send</st> <st data-num="846" class="">them</st> <st data-num="630">away</st> <st data-num="2443">so that</st> they can <st data-num="565" class="">go</st> <st data-num="1519" class="">into</st> the <st data-num="2945" class="">surrounding</st> <st data-num="68" class="">countryside</st> <st data-num="2532" class="">and</st> <st data-num="2968" class="">villages</st> and <st data-num="59" class="">buy</st> <st data-num="5101" class="">something</st> for <st data-num="1438" class="">themselves</st> to <st data-num="2068">eat</st>.”

<st data-num="1161" class="">But</st> he <st data-num="611" class="">answered</st> <st data-num="846" class="">them</st>,<n id="1" /> “You<n id="2" /> <st data-num="1325" class="">give</st> <st data-num="846" class="">them</st> something to <st data-num="2068">eat</st>.” <st data-num="2532" class="">And</st> they <st data-num="3004" class="">said</st>, “Should we <st data-num="565" class="">go</st> and <st data-num="59" class="">buy</st> <st data-num="740" class="">bread</st> for <st data-num="1250">200</st> <st data-num="1220">silver coins</st><n id="3" /> <st data-num="2532" class="">and</st> <st data-num="1325" class="">give</st> it to <st data-num="846" class="">them</st> to <st data-num="2068">eat</st>?”

He <st data-num="3004" class="">said</st> to <st data-num="846" class="">them</st>, “<st data-num="4214">How many</st> <st data-num="740" class="">loaves</st> do you <st data-num="2192" class="">have</st>? <st data-num="5217" class="">Go</st> and <st data-num="1492" class="">see</st>.” When they <st data-num="1097">found out</st>, they <st data-num="3004" class="">said</st>, “<st data-num="4002">Five</st>—<st data-num="2532" class="">and</st> <st data-num="1417" class="">two</st> <st data-num="2486" class="">fish</st>.”

<st data-num="2532" class="">Then</st> he <st data-num="2004" class="">directed</st> <st data-num="846" class="">them</st> <st data-num="3956" class="">all</st> to <st data-num="347">sit down</st> in <st data-num="4849" class="">groups</st> <st data-num="1909" class="">on</st> the <st data-num="5515" class="">green</st> <st data-num="5528" class="">grass</st>.

<st data-num="2532" class="">So</st> they <st data-num="377" class="">reclined</st> in <st data-num="4237" class="">groups</st> <st data-num="2596" class="">of</st> <st data-num="1540" class="">hundreds</st> <st data-num="2532" class="">and</st> <st data-num="4004" class="">fifties</st>.

He <st data-num="2983" class="">took</st> the <st data-num="4002" class="">five</st> <st data-num="740" class="">loaves</st> <st data-num="2532" class="">and</st> the <st data-num="1417" class="">two</st> <st data-num="2486" class="">fish</st>, and <st data-num="308">looking up</st> <st data-num="1519">to</st> <st data-num="3772" class="">heaven</st>, he <st data-num="2127">gave thanks</st> <st data-num="2532" class="">and</st> <st data-num="2622" class="">broke</st> the <st data-num="740" class="">loaves</st>. He<n id="1" /> <st data-num="1325" class="">gave</st> them to his<n id="2" /> <st data-num="3101" class="">disciples</st> <st data-num="2443" class="">to</st> <st data-num="3908" class="">serve</st> the <st data-num="846" class="">people</st>, <st data-num="2532" class="">and</st> he <st data-num="3307" class="">divided</st> the <st data-num="1417" class="">two</st> <st data-num="2486" class="">fish</st> among them <st data-num="3956" class="">all</st>.
They <st data-num="3956" class="">all</st> <st data-num="2068">ate</st> <st data-num="2532" class="">and</st> were <st data-num="5526" class="">satisfied</st>,

<st data-num="2532" class="">and</st> they <st data-num="142" class="">picked up</st> the <st data-num="2801" class="">broken pieces</st> <st data-num="2532" class="">and</st> <st data-num="2486" class="">fish</st> that were left over, <st data-num="1427" class="">12</st> <st data-num="2894" class="">baskets</st> <st data-num="4138" class="">full</st>.
Now there were 5,000 men who ate the bread.
Immediately Jesus made his disciples get into the boat and go on ahead to the other side, to Bethsaida, while he dispersed the crowd.

After <st data-num="657">saying goodbye</st> to <st data-num="846" class="">them</st>, he <st data-num="565" class="">went</st> <st data-num="1519" class="">to</st> the <st data-num="3735" class="">mountain</st> to <st data-num="4336" class="">pray</st>.

When <st data-num="3798" class="">evening</st> <st data-num="1096" class="">came</st>, the <st data-num="4143" class="">boat</st> <st data-num="1510" class="">was</st> <st data-num="1722" class="">in</st> the <st data-num="3319" class="">middle</st> of the <st data-num="2281" class="">sea</st> <st data-num="2532" class="">and</st> <st data-num="846" class="">he</st> was <st data-num="3441" class="">alone</st> <st data-num="1909" class="">on</st> the <st data-num="1093" class="">land</st>.

He<n id="1" /> <st data-num="1492">saw</st> <st data-num="846" class="">them</st> <st data-num="928" class="">straining</st> <st data-num="1722" class="">at</st> the <st data-num="1643" class="">oars</st> <st data-num="1063" class="">because</st> the <st data-num="417" class="">wind</st> <st data-num="1510" class="">was</st> <st data-num="1727" class="">against</st> <st data-num="846" class="">them</st>. As the <st data-num="3571" class="">night</st> was <st data-num="5067 5438">ending</st>,<n id="2" /> he <st data-num="2064" class="">came</st> <st data-num="4314" class="">to</st> <st data-num="846" class="">them</st> <st data-num="4043" class="">walking</st> <st data-num="1909" class="">on</st> the <st data-num="2281" class="">sea</st>,<n id="3" /> <st data-num="2532">for</st><n id="4" /> he <st data-num="2309" class="">wanted</st> to <st data-num="3928">pass by</st> <st data-num="846" class="">them</st>.<n id="5" />

When they <st data-num="1492" class="">saw</st> <st data-num="846" class="">him</st> <st data-num="4043" class="">walking</st> <st data-num="1909" class="">on</st> the <st data-num="2281" class="">water</st><n id="1" /> they <st data-num="1380" class="">thought</st> he <st data-num="1510" class="">was</st> a <st data-num="5326" class="">ghost</st>. They<n id="2" /> <st data-num="349">cried out</st>,

<st data-num="1063" class="">for</st> they <st data-num="3956" class="">all</st> <st data-num="1492" class="">saw</st> <st data-num="846" class="">him</st> <st data-num="2532" class="">and</st> were <st data-num="5015" class="">terrified</st>. <st data-num="1161" class="">But</st> <st data-num="2117" class="">immediately</st> he <st data-num="2980" class="">spoke</st> <st data-num="3326" class="">to</st> <st data-num="846" class="">them:</st><n id="1" /> “<st data-num="2293">Have courage</st>! It <st data-num="1510" class="">is</st> <st data-num="1473" class="">I</st>. Do <st data-num="3361" class="">not</st> be <st data-num="5399" class="">afraid</st>.”

<st data-num="2532" class="">Then</st> he <st data-num="305">went up</st> <st data-num="4314" class="">with</st> <st data-num="846" class="">them</st> <st data-num="1519" class="">into</st> the <st data-num="4143" class="">boat</st>, <st data-num="2532" class="">and</st> the <st data-num="417" class="">wind</st> <st data-num="2869" class="">ceased</st>. They were <st data-num="3029" class="">completely</st> <st data-num="1839" class="">astonished</st>,
because they did not understand about the loaves, but their hearts were hardened.
After they had crossed over, they came to land at Gennesaret and anchored there.

As <st data-num="846" class="">they</st> <st data-num="1831">got out</st> <st data-num="1537" class="">of</st> the <st data-num="4143" class="">boat</st>, people <st data-num="2117" class="">immediately</st> <st data-num="1921" class="">recognized</st> <st data-num="846" class="">Jesus</st>.<n id="1" />

They <st data-num="4063">ran through</st> <st data-num="1565" class="">that</st> <st data-num="3650" class="">whole</st> <st data-num="5561" class="">region</st> <st data-num="2532" class="">and</st> <st data-num="757">began</st> to <st data-num="4064" class="">bring</st> the <st data-num="2560" class="">sick</st> <st data-num="1909" class="">on</st> <st data-num="2895" class="">mats</st> to <st data-num="3699" class="">wherever</st> he was <st data-num="191" class="">rumored</st> to <st data-num="1510" class="">be</st>.<n id="1" />

And wherever he would go—into villages, towns, or countryside—they would place the sick in the marketplaces, and would ask him if they could just touch the edge of his cloak, and all who touched it were healed.
